Card of Safe Return._current: When a monster(s) is Special Summoned from your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can DRAW 1 card.
Card of Safe Return.previous: When a monster is Special Summoned from your GY, you can DRAW 1 card.

Dimension Fusion._current: Pay 2000 LP; each player Special Summons as many of their banished monsters as possible.
Dimension Fusion.previous: Pay 2000 Life Points. Both players Special Summon as many of their removed from play monsters as possible.

Drill Warrior._current:
"Drill Synchron" + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
① OPT | During your Main Phase 1: You can halve this card's ATK, and if you do, it can attack your opponent directly this turn.
② OPT | You can DISCARD 1 card, and if you do, BANISH this card.
③ During your next Standby Phase: Special Summon this card banished by this effect, then add 1 monster from your GY to your hand.
Drill Warrior.previous:
"Drill Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
① OPT | During your Main Phase 1: You can halve this card's ATK, and if you do, it can attack your opponent directly this turn.
② OPT | You can DISCARD 1 card, and if you do, BANISH this card.
③ During your next Standby Phase: Special Summon this card banished by this effect, then add 1 monster from your GY to your hand.

Enigmaster Packbit._current: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters ① HOPT | If this card is Synchro Summoned, or sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster in your GY, or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; DISCARD 1 card, and if you do, place that monster in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. ② HOPT | During either player's turn, if this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Monster Card from your Spell & Trap Zone.

Fishborg Blaster._current: If you control a face-up Level 3 or lower WATER monster: You can DISCARD 1 card; Special Summon this card from your GY. If this card is used as Synchro Material, all other Synchro Materials must be WATER.
Fishborg Blaster.previous: If you control a face-up Level 3 or lower WATER monster: You can DISCARD 1 card; Special Summon this card from your GY. If this card is used as a Synchro Material Monster, all other Synchro Material Monsters must be WATER.

Raidraptor - Rising Rebellion Falcon._current: 5 Level 13 Winged Beast monsters ① Unaffected by other cards' effects. ② If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can DESTROY as many cards your opponent controls as possible, then if this card has 3 or more "Raidraptor" Xyz Monsters with different names as material, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined original ATK of the destroyed monsters. ③ OPT | You can detach 3 materials from this card, then target 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster in your GY; this card gains that monster's effects until the End Phase.

Reactan, Dragon Ruler of Pebbles._current: HOPT | You can DISCARD this card and 1 Dragon or EARTH monster; Special Summon 1 "Redox, Dragon Ruler of Boulders" from your Deck, but it cannot attack this turn.
Reactan, Dragon Ruler of Pebbles.previous: You can DISCARD this card AND 1 Dragon or EARTH monster; Special Summon 1 "Redox, Dragon Ruler of Boulders" from your Deck. It cannot attack this turn. You can only use the effect of "Reactan, Dragon Ruler of Pebbles" once per turn.

Rescue Hedgehog._current: HOPT | You can BANISH this card you control; Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower monsters from your Deck with the same Type, Attribute, and Level as each other (1 Normal Monster and 1 Effect Monster), but their effects are negated, also DESTROY them during the End Phase.

Return from the Different Dimension._current: Pay half your LP; Special Summon as many of your banished monsters as possible. During the End Phase, BANISH all monsters that were Special Summoned by this effect.
Return from the Different Dimension.previous: Pay half your Life Points; Special Summon as many of your banished monsters as possible. During the End Phase, BANISH all monsters that were Special Summoned by this effect.

Shocktopus._current:
When this card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster and sent to the GY: You can equip this card to that opponent's monster.
That monster's ATK becomes 0, also it cannot change its battle position.
Shocktopus.previous:
① When this card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster and sent to the GY: You can equip this card to that opponent's monster.
② That monster's ATK becomes 0, also it cannot change its battle position.

Skull Guardian, Protector of the Voicele._current:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Prayers of the Voiceless Voice".
① Gains 2050 ATK while you have "Lo, the Prayers of the Voiceless Voice" on your field or in your GY.
② HOPT | If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can SEARCH 1 "Voiceless Voice" monster, or 1 Ritual Monster (Warrior or Dragon).
③ HOPT | QUICK | When your opponent activates a card or effect while you control "Lo, the Prayers of the Voiceless Voice": You can NEGATE the activation, and if you do, DESTROY that card.

XX-Saber Gottoms._current: 1 Tuner + 1+ EARTH monsters ① You can Tribute 1 "X-Saber" monster; DISCARD 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
XX-Saber Gottoms.previous:
1 Tuner + 1 or more EARTH monsters
① You can Tribute 1 "X-Saber" monster to DISCARD 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
